title: Endings Guide
content:
ch becomes the Mind Flayer and You Betray Her (The Dark Urge)

Ending Requirements and Conditions:

Free Orpheus Entrust the Netherstones to Orpheus Betray Karlach during the final battle Must have The Dark Urge origin

How to Obtain Ending:

Free Orpheus Reject the offer of The Emperor to work together Choose the dialogue options below that will prompt Karlach to do it instead of you As Karlach resists the Netherbrain's temptation, attack her Claim the throne in Bhaal's name

ENDING DESCRIPTION
